code: import{connect}from'react-redux';import{PreviewProduct}from'../Component/CardComponents/PreviewProduct';import{AddToCart,RemoveToCart}from'../Services/Actions/Actions';var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state,ownProps){return{data:state};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{AddToCartHandler:function AddToCartHandler(data){return dispatch(AddToCart(data));},RemoveToCartHandler:function RemoveToCartHandler(data){return dispatch(RemoveToCart(data));}};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(PreviewProduct);
